short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to help you navigate your tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly manage your tabs.  Tabba lets you open a search box for all your tabs, supports fuzzy search, closing, and switching to tabs.  Customizable hotkeys. No frills, works lightning fast. No cloud sync or any central server to steal your information or slow things down. 

By default, the hotkey to open the popup is ctrl-period, you can change this by going to chrome://extensions and clicking the menu in the top left, then editing keyboard shortcuts.  

If you right click the tabba icon ond click options, then you'll see the hotkeys for navigating the actual tabs inside the extension.

Open source, code hosted here: https://github.com/bradens/tabba

If you have any issues, open one here: https://github.com/bradens/tabba/issues

Accepting pull requests :)
